fields.name: popupVideoButtonSource
fields.label: Popup video button source
fields.description: Paste the iframe video link (not the entire iframe code) here.

fields.name: serviceBarActive
fields.label: Activate Service Bar
fields.description: Services are edited in the Global Menu

fields.name: backgroundVideoSource
fields.label: Background video source
fields.description: Paste the video source link here. Make sure background video functionality is set to true. note: vimeo download link is the recommended method tutorial here (https://vimeo.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/224823567-Direct-links-to-video-files)

fields.name: backgroundImageSourceDesktop
fields.label: Background image source (Desktop)
fields.description: (Optimal size: width = 1920px, height = 900px) The image that will be displayed if the background video is deactivated.

fields.name: backgroundImageSourceMobile
fields.label: Background image source (mobile)
fields.description: (Optimal size: width = 320px, height = 468px) The image that will be displayed on mobile.

fields.name: ctaHref
fields.label: Call To Action Href
fields.description: When somebody clicks the Call To Action, it will go to this location.

fields.name: twoColumnText
fields.label: Two Column Body Text
fields.description: Leave blank to deactivate

fields.name: featuredImage
fields.label: Featured Image(s)
fields.description: Adding more than one image will activate slider functionality

fields.name: iconList
fields.label: Icon List (SVG file type only please!)

fields.name: href
fields.label: Button Href
fields.description: When the button is clicked the user will go to this location.

fields.name: mainCallToActionHref
fields.label: Main call to action Href
fields.description: The location a user will be brought to when the CTA is clicked.

fields.name: secondaryCallToActionLabel
fields.label: Secondary call to action Label
fields.description: Leave blank to disable

fields.name: secondaryCallToActionVideoActive
fields.label: Secondary call to action video popup
fields.description: When this is activated, a video pop will occur when the button is clicked.

fields.name: secondaryCallToActionHrefOrSource
fields.label: Secondary call to action href or video source
fields.description: If video is activated, paste the video embedded source, if not, input the buttons link (location).

fields.name: headline
fields.label: Headline
fields.description: Leave blank to deactivate headline

fields.name: mainCallToActionHref
fields.label: Main call to action Href
fields.description: The location a user will be brought to when the CTA is clicked.

fields.label: Title
fields.description: 50-60 characters
fields.name: title

fields.label: Description
fields.description: 155-160 characters
fields.name: description
mapEnabled
fields.label: Enable Footer Map
fields.description: The google map in the footer can be turned on and off. Note: using the map in the footer is a double edged sword, on one hand, google like when a map is in the footer with your location information. However, google maps can decrease page load speed.

fields.name: preHeaderCtaLabel
fields.label: Pre Header Call To Action Label

fields.name: preHeaderCtaHref
fields.label: Pre Header Call To Action Href
fields.description: When somebody clicks the label, it will go to this location.

fields.name: href
fields.label: Link Href
fields.description: When somebody clicks the link, it will go to this location.

fields.name: ctaHref
fields.label: Call To Action Href
fields.description: When somebody clicks the Call To Action, it will go to this location.

fields.name: businessInfo
fields.label: Business Info
fields.description: The Broken Heart business info like hours, contact, social, etc.

fields.name: contact
fields.label: Contact
fields.description: Your contact info that is propagated throughout the site automatically!

fields.name: address
fields.label: Address
fields.description: Your business address.

fields.label: Hours
fields.name: hours
fields.description: Enter your business hours by day.

fields.name: monday
fields.label: Monday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Monday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: tuesday
fields.label: Tuesday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Tuesday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: wednesday
fields.label: Wednesday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Wednesday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: thursday
fields.label: Thursday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Thursday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: friday
fields.label: Friday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Friday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: saturday
fields.label: Saturday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Saturday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: sunday
fields.label: Sunday Hours
fields.description: Enter the hours for Sunday. Format 00:00 - 00:00

fields.name: socialLinks
fields.label: Social Links
fields.description: Input the Broken Heart social links.

fields.name: facebook
fields.label: Facebook Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the Broken Heart Facebook page. (Leave blank if there is none)

fields.name: instagram
fields.label: Instagram Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the Broken Heart Instagram page. (Leave blank if there is none)

fields.name: youtube
fields.label: Youtube Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the Broken Heart Youtube page. (Leave blank if there is none)

fields.name: maps
fields.label: Maps Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the Broken Heart Maps page. (Leave blank if there is none)

fields.name: linkedin
fields.label: Linkedin Link
fields.description: Enter the link to the Broken Heart Linkedin page. (Leave blank if there is none)

fields.name: services
fields.label: Services
fields.description: This section will be removed from the Global Menu in a future update when service pages are introduced

fields.name: serviceBarImage
fields.label: Service Bar Image
fields.description: (Optimal Size: width: 238px height: 337px) The image that will be display on the Broken Heart home page service bar on mouse hover.

fields.name: testimonials
fields.label: Testimonials
fields.description: Add Broken Heart testimonials by page

fields.name: testimonialsList
fields.label: Testimonials
fields.description: Create/delete testimonials and add/remove them by page

fields.name: shortDescription
fields.label: Short Description
fields.description: Example: "IEA Team Member"

fields.name: activePages
fields.label: Active Pages
fields.description: Choose the pages you want this testimonial to be on

fields.name: title
fields.label: Active Pages
fields.description: Choose the pages you want this testimonial to be on

fields.name: videoSource
fields.label: Video Source
fields.description: Paste the src link from the vimeo embeded code here (ie in the embed code you will see src='{copy the link in here}'). Make sure video functionality is enabled. Video tutorial here: (https://vimeo.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/224823567-Direct-links-to-video-files)

fields.name: events
fields.label: Events
fields.description: Add Broken Heart events globally

fields.name: camps
fields.label: Camps
fields.description: Add Broken Heart camps globally
